Class LibUI

  • java.lang.Object

  • public abstract class LibUI
extends java.lang.Object
    All independent UI-functions.

      • setupButton

        public static final void setupButton(android.app.Activity activity,
                                     int buttonId,
                                     int textId,
                                     java.lang.Runnable action,
                                     android.graphics.Typeface typeface)
        Sets up a Button with the major attributes.
        Parameters:
        activity - The current system context.
        buttonId - The id of the button to configure.
        textId - The resource-ID for the caption of this button.
        action - The OnClick-action.
        typeface - The custom typeface to use for this button.

        Sets up a TextView with the major attributes.
        Parameters:
        activity - The current system context.
        textViewId - The ID of the TextView to configure.
        textId - The ID of the text to set for the TextView.
        typeface - The custom typeface to use for this TextView.

      • createImageView

        public static final android.widget.ImageView createImageView(android.content.Context context,
                                                             int imageID,
                                                             android.widget.ImageView.ScaleType scaleType)
        Creates a ImageView that holds the specified image.
        Parameters:
        context - The current context.
        imageID - The resource-ID of the image to set into the ImageView.
        scaleType - The ScaleType to set for this ImageView.
        Returns:
        The created ImageView holding the given image.

      • setOnClickAction

        public static final void setOnClickAction(android.view.View view,
                                          java.lang.Runnable action,
                                          boolean setViewSelectedOnClick)
        Assigns the specified action to the specified view. The action is invoked if the view's OnClick-event is invoked. The view is marked as selected in addition.
        Parameters:
        view - The view to assign the action to.
        action - The OnClick-action to assign.
        setViewSelectedOnClick - Determines if the view shall be explicitly tagges as 'selected'.

      • getInflatedLayoutById

        public static final android.view.View getInflatedLayoutById(android.content.Context context,
                                                            int id)
        Inflates and returns a view by id even if the View is not set as the current activitie's content-view.
        Parameters:
        context - The current system context.
        id - The resource-layout-id of the layout to inflate.
        Returns:
        The inflated View.
